hook:
MOMENTUM UPDATE: 40 PRs merged this week.

We are moving fast to expand beyond images into a fully multimodal infrastructure. The goal is simple: give developers the best open-source tools to build AI apps without the headache.
body:
Here is what shipped to the Pollinations platform this week:

1. AUDIO STACK COMPLETE → We enabled ElevenMusic with precise duration-based billing and added OVH Whisper for speech-to-text. Whether you are generating soundtracks or transcribing voice, the pipelines are now fully operational.

2. NEXT-GEN VIDEO → Video generation got a major upgrade with the LTX-2 model and Grok Imagine Video integration. The quality and consistency of motion are improving rapidly.

3. AGENT INFRASTRUCTURE → We simplified the setup for autonomous agents. OpenClaw now auto-installs and onboards directly in the setup script. Plus, we open-sourced the code for our own Polly Discord Bot so you can fork and modify it.

4. UNIFIED DEV EXPERIENCE → We merged the Documentation directly into the Play page. You can now test models and read the docs in the same interface. Less context switching, more shipping.

Why this matters:
We are seeing over 500 apps built on our platform. Every efficiency gain we ship ripples out to thousands of end-users immediately.

We build in the open because we believe the future of AI belongs to the community, not black boxes.
cta: Check out the new models on the platform. Link in the comments.
